data.lyric:
[ti:Round Here Buzz]
[ar:Eric Church]
[al:Mr. Misunderstood]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]Round Here Buzz - Eric Church
[00:06.30]Another Friday night
[00:07.61]There's a line of cars leaving
[00:10.25]Home team's got an out-of-towner
[00:12.39]
[00:13.00]Me I'm sitting on the hood of mine drinking
[00:16.52]I'm just a parking lot down-and-outer
[00:18.74]
[00:25.72]Under that high school bleacher
[00:27.50]I drove that preacher's daughter crazy
[00:30.49]
[00:31.84]Her mama was my homeroom teacher
[00:33.96]And her dad was hell bent on saving me
[00:38.15]
[00:44.15]Yeah I'm sure there's higher highs
[00:46.27]
[00:47.33]Where the high risers rise
[00:49.60]
[00:50.84]But me I'm gonna sit right here tonight and
[00:56.44]Catch me a around here buzz
[00:58.82]
[00:59.57]Cause you ain't around here none
[01:01.85]
[01:02.61]Keep putting em down here nother round here
[01:06.17]Till my down goes up
[01:08.23]
[01:08.96]Lit up like that one stoplight
[01:11.27]
[01:12.15]Across from that welcome sign
[01:14.49]
[01:16.58]Ever since you caught that out there bug
[01:19.44]
[01:21.56]I catch me a around here buzz
[01:24.06]
[01:29.27]I never had big-city eyes
[01:31.41]Hell I've never been east of Dallas
[01:33.85]
[01:34.92]Got no idea where you are now
[01:37.70]
[01:38.56]If you ever got that penthouse palace
[01:41.44]
[01:44.26]No Scotty's ain't got no vibe
[01:46.49]
[01:47.12]Got no gas in his neon light
[01:49.42]
[01:50.74]But he's got two-for-one till 200 tonight
[01:54.42]
[01:56.46]Catch me a around here buzz
[01:58.79]
[01:59.48]Cause you ain't around here none
[02:01.85]
[02:02.62]Keep putting em down here nother round here
[02:06.18]Till my down goes up
[02:08.25]
[02:08.96]Lit up like that one stoplight
[02:11.27]
[02:12.19]Across from that welcome sign
[02:14.44]
[02:16.60]Ever since you caught that out there bug
[02:19.47]
[02:21.62]I catch me a around here buzz
[02:24.11]
[02:40.58]Catch me a around here buzz
[02:42.91]
[02:43.58]Cause you ain't around here none
[02:46.08]
[02:46.67]Keep putting em down here nother round here
[02:50.07]Till my down here
[02:51.78]
[02:52.86]Is lit up like that one stoplight
[02:55.40]
[02:55.92]Across from that welcome sign
[02:58.59]
[03:00.38]Ever since you caught that out there bug
[03:03.26]
[03:05.38]I catch me a around here buzz
[03:07.69]
[03:11.47]I catch me a around here buzz
[03:13.99]
[03:17.79]Round here buzz
[03:18.62]
